Question: Airium CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
Airium

CES 2024

- Introducing the Airium CES 2024, a revolutionary air purifier with advanced HEPA filtration technology
- Equipped with smart sensors for real-time air quality monitoring and automatic adjustment of fan speed
- Offers a sleek and modern design with customizable LED lighting options
- Includes a mobile app for remote control and scheduling of purification settings
- Ideal for rooms up to 500 square feet, providing efficient and quiet operation for improved indoor air quality.
